Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory826.jpg'}
{3: 'Hours into driving in the desert, the night begins to fall.'}
{3: 'The desert temperature drops drastically at night, plummeting to below zero. Humans must race against the Terminator Line and hurry to the conservation area.'}
{3: 'With low visibility after the storm, Watanabe is relying on limited lighting and his familiarity with the desert to navigate.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Inside the vehicle, the passengers, still feeling joyous about surviving the disaster, are now starting to feel stressed out as reality sets in.'}
{2: 'Male Civilian', 3: "We finally escaped, but I really don't feel happy thinking about jail time ahead...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Civilian', 3: 'Stop complaining. We chose this path, so now we have to deal with it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Male Civilian', 3: "I don't want to sound ungrateful. I'm glad we were saved, but aren't you worried about life in prison?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Civilian', 3: "Of course I'm scared... But I made a mistake back then, and now I have to face the consequences. There's no point in complaining.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Female Civilian', 3: 'Enough talking. We have a lot to deal with tomorrow. Get some sleep.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory825.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 3: '1', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{3: 'The murmurs from the back seats gradually fade as they fall asleep.'}
{2: '(Reach over to close the rear window)', 3: '21'}
{3: 'Smack—'}
{3: 'To avoid disturbing Watanabe, who is driving, you reach over to close the rear window.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's fine. Their voices don't bother me.", 4: '1'}
{2: "You sound like you're used to this.", 3: '27'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's only natural. They're just ordinary people with emotions. Just because I saved them doesn't mean they'll suddenly have a change of heart.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I don't expect them to be grateful or see me as a savior... As long as they can find their way back onto the right path, that would be enough.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm the one who should be apologizing for dragging you into this mess today.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't worry. I didn't come here for their gratitude, either.", 3: '31'}
{3: 'Watanabe has been driving for hours without rest. The weak light from the headlights barely illuminates his face, making his expression unreadable.'}
{3: "Despite this, Watanabe's tone shows no signs of fatigue. He recounts the day's events as if it were just another ordinary day."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'If I wanted gratitude, hearing thanks from comrades like you would be enough.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Even if they did thank me, I wouldn't know if it was sincere or just politeness.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I saved them for my own peace of mind, so how they feel is irrelevant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But you... you're different. You came here, risking your life, because you trust me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "My persistence has value as long as you trust me and believe in what I'm doing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course it is valuable.', 3: '39'}
{2: "You also mentioned that many of them aren't bad people, only desperate people.", 3: '40'}
{2: 'And you saved them, giving them another choice.', 3: '41'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Yeah... I hope they seize this chance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's already nightfall. We need to hurry and get them to the conservation area.", 4: '1'}
{3: "You instinctively hunch your shoulders as the desert temperature drops steadily with the night's arrival."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Here's a blanket. Keep yourself warm.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe pulls out a blanket from the storage compartment next to the driver's seat and puts it over you. The blanket carries a faint scent of tobacco."}
{2: "It's much warmer now wrapped in this blanket.", 3: '49'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's still a long way to conservation area 148. You should get some sleep.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What about you?', 3: '51'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Did you forget that I'm a Construct and don't need rest?", 4: '1'}
{2: "I mean, you don't need someone to chat with on the road?", 3: '53'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "This isn't my first solo mission and I'm not that impatient.", 4: '1'}
{2: "But I'll be heading back soon.", 3: '55'}
{2: "It feels like we haven't talked much during this trip.", 3: '56'}
{3: 'Silence falls in the cabin for a moment before Watanabe speaks again with a slightly indulgent tone.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Alright, what do you want to talk about?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Outside the window, the starry sky is reflecting light from billions of years ago, and the bright moon is casting a frosty veil over everything below.'}
{3: 'The distant horizon shows no signs of human structures. This is raw nature, silently rejecting human interference.'}
{3: 'The sand dunes in the distance are layered like ink, looking as if they are both near and far at the same time.'}

{3: "The armor vehicle's bright lights cut through the hills like a shooting star. You can see the small circle illuminated by the searchlight but can never fully grasp the vastness of the desert. It is a surreal feeling."}
{2: "It's so beautiful...", 3: '65'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Where? This vast expanse of sand?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Though desert storms are terrifying, the peaceful desert after the storm is beautiful.', 3: '68'}
{2: 'Nature has this terrifying yet beautiful duality.', 3: '69'}
{3: 'Watanabe rolls down the window, letting the frigid night wind fill the small cabin.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...Well, no one's ever said that to me before.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But I have to admit, the desert at night... is indeed different from daytime.', 4: '1'}
{2: "It isn't every day that you get to stare into the middle of the desert at night.", 3: '73'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Haha, if you like it, you can stay with the Forsaken and stare at it every day.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I've mentioned before, Babylonia is a place I want to change...", 3: '76'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "A place you want to change and not to escape. Right, don't worry, I remember.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "So, let's discuss this when the war ends.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Wrapped in the warm blanket, sleepiness gradually sets in.'}
{2: 'It will end soon...', 3: '82'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '【kuroname】?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Then, there will be plenty of time...', 3: '85'}
{2: 'We can enjoy the desert landscape at night or go on...', 3: '86'}
{2: 'Desert travels...', 3: '87'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '3'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab'}
{3: 'With heavy eyelids, you slowly close your eyes.'}
{3: 'Talking with Watanabe brings an unexpected sense of reassurance.'}
{3: 'Staying by his side, it feels like those elusive dreams could actually come true.'}
{3: 'Surrounded by this warm sense of security, you lean back in the passenger seat, gradually succumbing to sleep.'}
{3: 'You hear a gentle voice just before drifting into slumber.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Sweet dreams, 【kuroname】.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory544.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 3: '1', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{3: 'The blinding sunlight jolts you awake. You are approaching the conservation area.'}
{3: "The driver's seat is empty. It looks like Watanabe purposely didn't wake you up."}
{3: "When you step out of the vehicle, you see Watanabe leading Schneider's group and talking to the soldiers at the conservation area gate."}

{1: '1', 2: 'Conservation Area Soldier', 3: 'Thank you, Watanabe, for your contribution to maintaining the peace of conservation area 148. We will hand these people over to the legal authorities for their sentence.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'No problem.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'By the way, the Gray Raven Commandant 【kuroname】 also helped a lot in this operation. Please include that in the report.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Conservation Area Soldier', 3: 'Commandant 【kuroname】, right? We will contact Babylonia to submit this report.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'It looks like the handover process is almost done.'}
{3: 'When Watanabe is about to leave the conservation area, Schneider, who has been silent, suddenly calls out to him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Schneider', 3: "Watanabe, I'm not the only follower of Ballard. Taking me down won't end this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Schneider', 3: 'You can\'t save everyone. As long as there\'s chaos in this world, "Resisters" will rise up!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Conservation Area Soldier', 3: 'Hey! Stop spouting nonsense! You are nothing but a prisoner now!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Soldiers from the conservation area rush to restrain Schneider, but Watanabe waves them off, indicating he doesn't mind."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It doesn't matter. No matter how many come, my mission remains the same.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I will prove through my actions that our ideals will not be wavered.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe doesn't look back and walks in the opposite direction. Under the sunlight, his shadow slowly separates from Schneider's until they no longer intersect."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 3: '1', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Oh, 【kuroname】, you're awake.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm sorry that I left it for you to handle alone...", 3: '139'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'No worries. You were tired yesterday, so you should rest.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Babylonia contacted you through conservation area 148. They've designated a new rendezvous point. I'll drive you there.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_01.jpg'}
{3: 'Watanabe starts the car, and the steady roar of the engine signals the start of your journey once more.'}
{3: 'Outside, the sunlight is perfect. A perfect line has formed between the blue sky and the golden earth.'}
{3: 'The refreshing wind is blowing into the car, lifting your spirits.'}
{3: "You can't help but think of the promise that was made yesterday."}
{2: 'Watanabe, could we search for that oasis on our way back?', 3: '151'}
{3: 'You thought Watanabe would brush it off as a joke, but to your surprise, Watanabe nods.'}
{3: 'He grips the steering wheel tightly and accelerates. The powerful force pushes you back into your seats.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Alright, let's find our oasis together."}
